Module GraphicsPlayground

Package exceptions

package exceptions
Classes responsible for custom exceptions thrown within the application.
  • Exceptions
    Class
    Description
    OrderInOutException
    Boilerplate code for custom exception for If an order is not processes correctly
    OrderUnavailableException
    Custom exception invoked when an error is thrown in the PhoneNumber class
    PizzaFormatException
    Custom exception invoked when an error is thrown while parsing the text file using MenuLoader.
    TooManyToppingsException
    Exception thrown when too many toppings are attempted to be added to a pizza
